page.title: 06TRAFFIC IN WESTERLEIGH
page.content: {Westerleigh roads get quite busy. This is because people travel to work in Bristol from Yate instead of using the main road which is longer.{Early {morning and late afternoon tend to be {busy times.}Some children surveyed the traffic in Westerleigh.They found the {island in front of the church}to be a {very dangerous place.}Between 11.25 and 11.45 am.one morning, 54 vehicles passed by going towards Bath or Bristol.Our teacher is worried when he drives that way each morning because it is{difficult to see}in all directions.There have been{several {minor accidents. We would not like to live in the nearby houses because it would be very noisy and we could not play safely outside.A lorry might even crash into a garden.{We would complain to the {council about the traffic.
